_version.description: Represents SAP.CARD attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

designtime.description: The path to the design time folder with assets files

configuration.description: General configuration of the card. Allows to define parameters, destinations, filters and more

modelSizeLimit.description: [Experimental] Represents the maximum number of entries that are used for list bindings.

destinations.description: Describes what destinations are used by the card

csrfTokens.description: Describes the CSRF tokens used by the card

actionHandlers.description: Holds configuration for the default action handlers

submit.description: Configuration for the submit action handler

messages.description: Describes the messages for the card

type.description: Represents the type of the card's content

headerPosition.description: Represents card header position - under or over the content

content.description: Represents card content attributes. Content type should be the same as card type e.g. if card type List is used the content type should also be List

extension.description: A path to an Extension implementation. It is resolved relatively to the manifest

pageSize.description: Represents the number of the items in one page

totalCount.description: Represents the total count of the items in all pages

visible.description: Represents the visibility of the paginator
[Experimental] Visibility of the footer

type.description: Represents the type of the header

title.description: Represents a title of the header; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

titleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the title.

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the sub title.

actions.description: Represents a description of the actions that can be applied on a part of a card

icon.description: Represents the icon of the card

status.description: Represents the status of the card

closeButton.description: [Experimental] Represents the Close button when a card is opened by the ShowCard action.

visible.description: [Experimental] Visibility of the header

type.description: Represents the type of the header

title.description: Represents a title of the header; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

titleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the title.

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the sub title.

actions.description: Represents a description of the actions that can be applied on a part of a card

unitOfMeasurement.description: Represents unit of measurement for the whole numeric header

sideIndicatorsAlignment.description: The alignment of the side indicators

details.description: Represents additional information about the numeric header

detailsMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the details text.

sideIndicators.description: Multiple side indicators that relate to the main numeric indicator

status.description: Represents the status of the card

closeButton.description: [Experimental] Represents the Close button when a card is opened by the ShowCard action.

visible.description: [Experimental] Visibility of the header

HeaderType.Numeric.MainIndicator.description: Represents the main numeric indicator of the header

number.description: The value of the main indicator

unit.description: The unit of the main indicator

state.description: The state color of the main indicator

oneOf.description: The state color of the main indicator

visible.description: Visibility of the main indicator

HeaderType.Numeric.SideIndicator.description: Represents side indicator attributes which are used for additional information about the main indicator

title.description: Represents a title of the side indicator

number.description: Represents value of the side indicator

unit.description: Represents unit of measurement of the side indicator

state.description: The state color of the side indicator

oneOf.description: The state color of the side indicator

visible.description: Visibility of the side indicator

ContentType.Component.description: Represents the configuration for a component card's content

minItems.description: Represents the minimum expected number of items

highlight.description: The highlight state of the item

highlightText.description: Defines the semantics of the 'highlight' property. It is used for accessibility purposes.

attributesLayoutType.description: Defines the layout type of the attributes

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the item

ContentType.List.Item.ValueStateItem.description: Represents value and state information for an object

showStateIcon.description: Defines if a default state icon is shown

visible.description: Visibility of the item

title.description: Title of the data point. This is just a placeholder to store the title, title will not be rendered on the screen. This is needed to prevent the loss of columnn names while transforming table card to list card.

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the title

measureAxis.description: [Deprecated] Represents the value set for measure axis

dimensionAxis.description: [Deprecated] Represents the value set for dimension axis

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the content

popover.description: Configuration for a popover, which will open while pressing chart points

active.description: Whether the popover is connected to the chart. If it's not it won't open

ContentType.Analytical.DataLabel.description: Represents value attributes in the plot area

visible.description: Visibility of the data labels

showTotal.description: Visibility of data label for total value in some charts

ContentType.Analytical.AxisText.description: Represents descriptive text of the axis

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the descriptive axis text
Defines whether the legend will be visible

position.description: Defines where the legend will be positioned

alignment.description: Defines how the legend will be aligned

values.description: The names of the measures or dimensions that are used for this feed

displayValue.description: Display value for the dimension. It doesn't work with 'waterfallType'

dataType.description: Data type of the dimension as displayed in the chart. Currently only in time series chart, it is required to set data type to 'date' if this column is going to feed the 'timeAxis'

ContentType.AnalyticsCloud.description: Represents SAP Analytics Cloud content attributes

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the content

minItems.description: Represents the minimum expected number of items

title.description: The title of the timeline item

description.description: The description of the timeline item

dateTime.description: The dateTime value of the timeline item

owner.description: The owner of the timeline item

ownerImage.description: The owner image of the timeline item

icon.description: The icon of the timeline item

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the item level

groups.description: Represents groups of information for an object

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the content

ContentType.Object.Group.description: Represents a group of information for an object

title.description: Represents a title of the object group; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

titleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limits the number of lines for wrapping the group title.

labelWrapping.description: [Experimental] Determines whether the labels of the group items will be wrapped.

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the group

ContentType.Object.Item.description: Represents a single item of information. It can contain label, value and image

icon.description: Defines the icon of the item

label.description: Defines the label of the item

showColon.description: Defines whether the colon next to the label is shown

value.description: Represents the text, which is associated with the label

tooltip.description: Defines the tooltip of the link

type.description: Defines the type of the displayed information. Some of the types are deprecated

url.description: [Deprecated] Defines the URL string. Works only with items of type 'link'

target.description: [Deprecated] Specifies the target of the link - it works like the target property of the HTML 'a' tag. Works only with items of type 'link'

emailSubject.description: [Deprecated] Represents the subject of the email. Works only with item of type 'email'

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the group item

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the item

sideIndicators.description: [Experimental] Multiple side indicators that relate to the main numeric indicator

sideIndicatorsAlignment.description: [Experimental] The alignment of the side indicators

template.description: [Experimental] Template definition for the icons in the group

path.description: [Experimental] Binding path to the icon data

size.description: [Experimental] The size of the icons in an IconGroup

details.description: Represents additional information about the numeric indicators

state.description: The state color of the item

showStateIcon.description: Defines if a default state icon is shown

selectedKey.description: Defines the initially selected key from the given options for ComboBox.

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the items

maxValue.description: The number of displayed symbols for RatingIndicator

visualMode.description: Defines how float values are visualized for RatingIndicator: Full (values are rounded to the nearest integer value (e.g. 1.7 -> 2)) or  Half (values are rounded to the nearest half value (e.g. 1.7 -> 1.5))

alt.description: The alternative text that is displayed in case the image is not available, or cannot be displayed.

fullWidth.description: Defines if the image will take the full width of the group, including the paddings. If set to false there will be padding. For best result use together with 'alignment': 'Stretched' for the group

ContentType.Object.Item.MainIndicator.description: Represents the main numeric indicator of the NumericData

number.description: The value of the main indicator

unit.description: The unit of the main indicator

state.description: The state color of the main indicator

oneOf.description: The state color of the main indicator

ContentType.Object.Item.IconGroupTemplat.description: Template definition for the icons in the group

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the icon

ContentType.Object.Item.IconGroupIcon.description: Definition for icons in the IconGroup

src.description: Represents icon name or source URL

text.description: [Deprecated] Represents text that will be displayed in the icon

initials.description: Used as fallback if the 'src' property is not set or there is an issue with the resource. Up to two Latin letters can be displayed

alt.description: Represents text that will be displayed as a tooltip

key.description: The unique key of the option. Mapped to the input's value

required.description: Defines whether the user input is required

minLength.description: Defines the minimum number of characters

maxLength.description: Defines the maximum number of characters

restrictToPredefinedOptions.description: Defines whether the value is restricted to predefined options

pattern.description: Sets the regular expression pattern that should match the value

validate.description: An extension function used to validate the value

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the item

highlight.description: The highlight state of the row

highlightText.description: Defines the semantics of the 'highlight' property. It is used for accessibility purposes.

minItems.description: Represents the minimum expected number of items

title.description: Represents a title of the column; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

width.description: Defines the width of the column

hAlign.description: Defines the horizontal alignment of the column content

value.description: Represents the text value of the column

additionalText.description: Represents the additional text for the identifier column.

state.description: Defines the state of the column

target.description: [Deprecated] Specifies where to open the 'url', if it is provided

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the column

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the group item

showStateIcon.description: Defines if a default state icon is shown

ContentType.Calendar.description: The calendar card is used to display a schedule of a single entity (such as person, resource) for a selected time interval

date.description: The initial date of the calendar which appointments are initially shown. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

noItemsText.description: The text shown when there are no items for the selected day

moreItems.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the button showing there are more items than the shown

actions.description: Represents an action that can be applied on he button showing there are more items than the shown

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the items

startDate.description: The start date of the item. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

endDate.description: The end date of the item. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

text.description: The additional information of the item

type.description: The type of the item - one of the types defined in the legend

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the item

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the legendItems

category.description: Defines which card component describes the legend item. Available categories: "calendar" (represented as square) or "appointment" (circle)

text.description: The describing information of the item

type.description: The type of the legend item corresponding with the described component

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the specialDates

startDate.description: The start date of the special date. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

endDate.description: The end date of the special date. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

type.description: The type of the special date - one of the types defined in the legend

ContentType.WebPage.description: WebPage content is used to embed HTML page

src.description: URL of the web page to be embedded
Represents icon name or source URL

shape.description: Represents the shape of the icon

text.description: [Deprecated] Initials for the avatar. Up to 2 symbols. If the image provided to the 'src' property fails to load, then the text will be shown

initials.description: Used as fallback if the 'src' property is not set or there is an issue with the resource. Up to two Latin letters can be displayed

visible.description: Visibility of the icon

minHeight.description: Defines the min-height of the Content as a CSS value

src.description: Represents icon name or source URL

shape.description: Represents the shape of the icon

text.description: [Deprecated] Initials for the avatar. Up to 2 symbols. If the image provided to the 'src' property fails to load, then the text will be shown

initials.description: Used as fallback if the 'src' property is not set or there is an issue with the resource. Up to two Latin letters can be displayed

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the icon

src.description: Represents icon name or source URL

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the icon
Represents the visibility of the status text

statusTextFormatter.description: Defines fields for dynamic status formatting

closeButton.description: [Experimental] Represents attributes of the Close button

visible.description: [Experimental] Represents the visibility of the Close button

path.description: The path from the JSON to be used as root

json.description: The data to be used directly. Without making requests

updateInterval.description: Represents interval in seconds, after which a new data request will be triggered

name.description: [Experimental] Gives a name to the data section. A model with the same name will be assigned to the card

json.description: The data to be used directly. Without making requests

url.description: The URL to make the request to

parameters.description: Represents the request parameters. If it is a POST request the parameters will be put as key/value pairs into the body of the request

retryAfter.description: Number of seconds before the request is retried if it failed the previous time

timeout.description: A timeout (in milliseconds) for the request. A value of 0 means there will be no timeout.

withCredentials.description: Indicates whether cross-site requests should be made using credentials

batch.description: Map of requests to be batched

batchRequest.description: Represents a request which is a part of a batch request

url.description: The URL to make the request to

maxAge.description: The maximum age for which the cache is considered fresh

staleWhileRevalidate.description: Should we show stale cache while revalidating

noStore.description: [Deprecated] Set to true to disable caching for this card

enabled.description: Set to false to disable caching for this card

extension.description: [Experimental] Represents attributes, needed to get data via extension

method.description: The method of the extension, which fetches data

args.description: The arguments, with which the method will be called

label.description: Represents a label of the field; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

visible.description: Represents the visibility of the field

action.description: Represents actions that can be applied on card elements

enabled.description: Represents the state of the action

url.description: [Deprecated] Represents the URL that will be used as navigation target if no service is provided

parameters.description: Parameters passed to the navigation action handler

target.description: [Deprecated] Specifies where to open the 'url', if it is provided

ibnTarget.description: An application identifier consisting of semanticObject and action

ibnParams.description: Key/value pairs for parameters of the target application

ibnAppSpecificRoute.description: An application specific route that is passed to the target application

manifest.description: An application identifier consisting of semanticObject and action

ibnTarget.description: The application identifier consisting of semanticObject and action or

service.description: Represents service that will be used for actions

oneOf.description: Represents name of the Service to be used for the action

name.description: Represents name of the Service to be used for the action

target.description: Specifies where to open an URL

Configuration.BasicDataType.description: Basic data types for parameters and filters

type.description: The type of the value for the parameter

label.description: Label for the parameter for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

description.description: Description of the parameter for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

label.description: Label for the filter. Used by screen readers

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the items

visible.description: Determines whether the filter is visible

title.description: The title of the filter option

key.description: The unique key of the filter option. Mapped to the filter's value

label.description: Label for the filter. Used by screen readers

options.description: Options that will appear in the dropdown

visible.description: Determines whether the filter is visible

label.description: Label for the filter. Used by screen readers

visible.description: Determines whether the filter is visible

Configuration.Destinations.description: Represents a configuration for a cloud platform destination

name.description: The name of the destination. Use the same name which is used in Cloud Platform

label.description: Label for the destination for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

description.description: Description of the destination for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

defaultUrl.description: A default url which will be used if there is no Host associated with the card

Configuration.CSRFToken.description: Represents a configuration for a CSRF token

Configuration.NoData.description: Represents a configuration for a NoData

title.description: Title shown in the illustrated message of the card

description.description: Description shown in the illustrated message of the card

size.description: Defines the size predefined from sap.m.IllustratedMessage

type.description: Defines the image predefined from sap.m.IllustratedMessage
Represents the type of the Microchart

value.description: The actual value shown as a colored horizontal bar

minValue.description: The minimum scale value for the bar chart

maxValue.description: The maximum scale value for the bar chart

displayValue.description: The actual value, which will be displayed as a text next to the bar

target.description: The target value - displayed as a vertical line (marker)

scale.description: The scaling suffix that is appended to all values

color.description: The state color of the bar

thresholds.description: The thresholds indicators of the bar

visible.description: Represents the visibility of the chart

color.description: The state color of the threshold

type.description: Represents the type of the Microchart

maxValue.description: The maximum scale value for the bar chart

displayValue.description: The value, which will be displayed as a text next to the bar

visible.description: Represents the visibility of the chart bar

value.description: The actual value shown as a colored horizontal bar

displayValue.description: The value, which will be displayed as a text in the tooltip of the bar

legendTitle.description: Title, which will be displayed in the legend

actions.description: Action(s) which will be executed when button is pressed

ariaHasPopup.description: Use this property only when the item is related to a popover/popup

visible.description: Determines whether the item is visible

order.description: The order by which the group will be sorted

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the group order

dir.description: The sorting direction in which the group items will be ordered
